ygData.subject: Re: RE: Symbol of Trans
ygData.msgSnippet: aye symbol and the courage line adds quite a bit on higher levels....i ve had a lv 50 cleric buff a lv 50 monk, and i think it almost doubled their hp....which
ygData.messageBody:
aye symbol and the courage line adds quite a bit on higher levels....i've had a
lv 50 cleric buff a lv 50 monk, and i think it almost doubled their hp....which
comes in really handy (;
have yet to use naltron tho....just got the spell last night, and didn't have
any peridots on me

(\/)ystix Spellchaser
lv 44 cleric of The Rathe

Mr. J Daniels wrote:

> From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
> You'll want to invest in the symbols from the second one on up, I'm
> currently on my 3rd line of symbol spells, the component costs a little
> over 1pp but its well worth it and can make a difference. I give
> approx +400 hp to my tanks when I use valor and the symbol spell. (its
> the level 34 symbol i'm using, and it requires jasper).
>
> Mr. J Daniels
>
> On Wed, 21 Jul 1999 elerion@... wrote:
>
> > From: elerion@...
> >
> > Glad someone else mentioned it, when i made 14 bought my spells, and didnt
> > know if any components were needed. But, since i just did a stint in the
> > pixies/fairies had a bunch of gems on me. Spell went off but at lev-14
> > didnt see any great improvements from center +holy armor, especially since
> > the gem cost about 3g+.
> >
> > Bikio, 14th Dwarf
> > Veeshan
